1.title: Hot Dog: Problem Solver #3 (Indecent Proposals with Diana & Jackie & James & Murf)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The third episode in a continuing series of helpful videos - no matter what the problems are, he'll solve them all.

1.title: Random Andrew Goes on a Blind Date

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The moment a girl called into the show to say she thought Random Andrew was cute, Chris Gethard jumped on the opportunity to set them up on a blind date. This video is the awkwardness that ensued.

2.title: NYC Subway Christmas Caroling

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Happy Holidays from The Chris Gethard Show! The team decided to take to the New York City subways in order to spread some Christmas cheer. Rob Malone, Bethany Hall, Random Andrew, The Human Fish, and Connor Ratliff hand deliver the Christmas Spirit to New Yorkers on the go. Unfortunately Chris hates every second of it.

3.title: Don Fanelli and Murf Take Random Andrew to the Museum of Sex

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: After seeing the Random Andrew blind date video, Don Fanelli and Matthew "Murf" Meyer decide to take Random Andrew on a tour of the Museum of Sex so they can teach him a thing or two about the world of romance.

4.title: Chris Gethard Looks for His Biggest Fan

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: After doing the show for almost a year Chris thinks it might be a good idea to take to the streets and find his biggest fan. Unfortunately it didn't go as smoothly as planned.

5.title: Who Wants to Be on Public Access?

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Bananaman hits the streets to find out who wants to be on Public Access.

7.title: Hot Dog Parrish Semi-Regular Book Review #1

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Andrew "Hot Dog" Parrish unleashes his new semi-regular book review series. You will never read a book the same way again. You may also never read again. Enjoy!

8.title: Who Wants to Be on Public Access (Post-Apocalypse)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Bananaman takes to the streets to see who wants to be on public access... except this time it's after the evil robot lord Stillman has taken over society (see TCGS #61 - Smash Cut to The Future)

10.title: Murf vs. Gimghoul: QUESTIONS

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Murf has made it his mission to expose a secret society in Chapel Hill known as the Order of Gimghoul. Why so secretive?!? Why not come out and chat? Murf wants answers.

11.title: Time Travel Set Change

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: In episode #62 we traveled to the future. For those wondering what was going on out side of the time machine, this is for you. If you are someone who truly believes in time travel, do not watch this.

14.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #1 - Ukelele Basics

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: In this first lesson, Hallie teaches the ukulele basics that she's picked up... specifically, how to tune, hold, & strum the ukulele. She also does a lot of carrying on about how awesome the ukulele is, while simultaneously griping about the things that are hard about it. If you're a real beginner, this video is for you. Hallie's Ukulele Army is a ukulele club for fans of "The Chris Gethard Show", where Hallie teaches TCGS fans how to play songs featured on the show. Pick up a uke and prepare for takeover!

15.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #2: I'm Gonna Learn to Play (C & G Chords)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: In the second episode of Hallie's Ukulele Army, Hallie teaches two chords (C and G), and her very first original song on the ukulele entitled, "I'm Gonna Learn To Play The Ukulele (Motherf**ker)"

16.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #3: "Emo Cocoon" (D, G, & a Chords)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: In this lesson, Hallie teaches two new chords (D & A), and a heart-wrenching original tune entitled "Emo Cocoon".

17.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #4: "The Chris Gethard Show Theme Song" (D, G, A, E)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Whoa! In this lesson, Hallie teaches the E chord and "The Chris Gethard Show Theme Song"... our first song from the show!

18.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #5: "Baltimore" (G, C, D) with Chris Gethard

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: In this episode, Hallie and special guest Chris Gethard cover "Baltimore" by the incredible Mal Blum. Mal is a great friend to "The Chris Gethard Show", and this is one of her best tunes. And, best of all, it is comprised of 3 simple chords that have already been taught in previous episodes: G, C, and D!

19.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #6: "Stellan from Sweden" (D, C, G, A)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: In this lesson, Hallie teaches how to play Stellan's theme song, using the chords D, C, G, and A.

20.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #7: "Checking in with Alyssa" (A, D, E)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: In this lesson, Hallie teaches "Checking In With Alyssa" using the chords A, D, and E. The song is the theme for one of our favorite regular callers on "The Chris Gethard Show", who (when she first started calling in to the show), was just a shy 16-year-old high school student who would call and tell us about her life.

21.title: Hallie's Ukelele Army #8: Shellshag's "Face to Face" with Chris Gethard (G, Em, C, D)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Hallie and Chris cover "Face To Face" (which Shellshag played with when they appeared on TCGS!). See their amazing performance here:

24.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #11: "Hollywood Gethard" (D, E, G, a Chords)... With STELLAN!

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: This week, Hallie teaches how to play one of her TCGS faves, "Hollywood Gethard"... with help from our buddy, Stellan from Sweden!! The song uses the chords D,E,G and A.

25.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #12: Human Fish (C Minor + Picking!)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: In this lesson, join Hallie in the Hamptons while she teaches you to play the Human Fish's theme song. The song contains only one chord, the fantastic C minor, while also introducing the idea of using a pick to play individual notes on the uke (for that recognizable Human Fish lead guitar part). Enjoy!

26.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #13: "I Don't Want to Live on the Moon" w/ Vacation Jason! (C, G, Am, F, Em)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: In this lesson, Vacation Jason teaches us his favorite song to play on the ukulele, "I Don't Want To Live On The Moon", from Sesame Street. The song contains the chords C, G, Am, F.... and the E minor! which is an exciting new chord for us Ukulele Army members.

27.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #14: Meet Paige The Intern! Plus "Am I Shaving You?" (D, G, A)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: This week Hallie sits down with our fabulous intern, Paige, to talk about songwriting, interning for The Chris Gethard Show, and her incredible TCGS-themed song "Am I Shaving You?". Paige teaches us how to serenade that special someone with the cutest love song ever written about a public access show.

28.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #15: "Why Don't You Give Us a Call?" (E, G, A, B Chords)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: In this lesson, Hallie teaches "Why Don't You Give Us A Call?", plus the enchanting B chord (the last major chord we have to learn!).

29.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #16: A Visit from Messenger Bag! "Who's Gonna Be the New Random"

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: This week Hallie is joined by Random Messenger Bag (a.k.a. Alex Clute) for a lesson on how to play "Who's Gonna Be The Random?" using the chords A, B, D and E. Watch to see many mysteries unraveled! Why does Messenger Bag have so many monikers? Why is Hallie's cat so cranky? How do you get that cool chugga chugga effect on a uke/guitar?

30.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #17: "Pump It Up" Featuring Connor Ratliff & Chris Gethard

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: This week Connor stopped by to play a song by his and Hallie's favorite... Elvis Costello! (And you won't wanna miss Gethard's understated-yet-masterful performance on the BUBUL TARANG.) We're celebrating the release of Elvis Costello's new album with The Roots, which comes out next week. Connor is a long-time, super-zealous Elvis Costello fan, and he proves it in this video.

31.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #18 - Weezer's "El Scorcho" with Keith Haskel & Chris Gethard

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

31.plot: Hallie, Bananaman (aka Keith Haskel) and Chris hanging out on the patio playing Weezer. No, we're not drunk.

32.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #19: "Bananaman" with.... Bananaman! (D, G, A)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

32.plot: In this episode, Hallie and special guest Bananaman teach you how to play his zippy theme song using the chords D, G, and A! Bananman gives us the scoop on how he got involved with The Chris Gethard Show, what he does as his alter-ego Keith Haskel, and why EVERYONE should wear costumes to TCGS!

33.title: Hallie's Ukulele Army #20: "Today's the Day" by the Unlovables. (C, G, Am, F)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

33.plot: Once upon a time, Hallie played in a punk band called the Unlovables. The Unlovables will be appearing as the musical guest on TCGS this week, so to get you pumped up, Hallie learned to play an Unlovables song on the uke. And YOU can learn it too! Transposed to the key of C for maximum ease and enjoyment. The original's in D if you wanna be a purist about it :)

34.title: Ukulele Army #21: "Pray for Rain" with Mikey Erg! (B, E, C#, F#)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

34.plot: Join Hallie as she hangs out in Queens with the one and only Mikey Erg from the LLC. Learn as Mikey and Hallie teach you how to play the incredible song, "Pray For Rain", which Mikey has played on The Chris Gethard Show not once, but TWICE, to the delight of fans. And in Hallie's interview with Mikey, find out how many bands he has been in (hint: more than probably anyone you know), what it was like to be the musical guest on our first-ever public access episode, and what that cool little box is that doubles as his chair AND his instrument on the show.

35.title: Mark Ribot's Ceramic Dog Interviewed by Connor Ratliff

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

35.plot: Mark Ribot's Ceramic Dog get interviewed in the midst of taking a pre-show nap by future Olympic gold medalist Connor Ratliff in the TCGS green room.

37.title: Say Yes to the Dress Spoof: The Guy Who Likes Cream, But Not Too Much Cream & His Personal Barista

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

37.plot: The Guy Who Likes Cream, But Not Too Much Cream & His Personal Barista go wedding dress shopping for the big day.

38.title: Crazy & the Brains Interviewed by Connor Ratliff

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

38.plot: Future Olympic gold medalist Connor Ratliff interviews Crazy & The Brains.

39.title: Ukulele Army #23: "Steal My Sunshine" with Griffin Newman & Julia Nathan

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

39.plot: Just in time for the debut of his new podcast, "Talkin' TCGS", Hallie's guest this week is comedian Griffin Newman. Griffin and Hallie cover 90's throwback, "Steal My Sunshine" by Len (with special guests Julia Nathan on banjo & cameraman Jersey Dave in a surprise cameo!). They talk about Len, TCGS as a dating Litmus Test, and what it was like to host the "Saddle-bee Neigh Hive" episode. This song is hilarious and, should you choose to cover it, only contains the chords A, E, and B over and over. The dialogue is from some weird version on the "Go" movie soundtrack, ...

40.title: TCGS Presents: F*@K Christmas, I Wish It Was Sandwich Night

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

40.plot: Happy Holidays from our messed up family to yours!

41.title: Ukulele Army #24: "Sweet Jane" with Hotdog Parrish

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

41.plot: Hallie is joined by Andrew Hotdog Parrish, Jamie Casbon, and Chris Gethard to cover The Velvet Underground's "Sweet Jane." Afterwards, the gang tries to get to the bottom of the Hotdog Conundrum with a game of "What's in Hotdog's Brain?" Watch as they go a little too deep down the rabbit hole getting to know the most lovably bizarre member of the TCGS family.

42.title: Vacation Jason Presents: Jason's Vacation

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

42.plot: You are cordially invited to go on Vacation with the World's #1 Vacation Expert, Vacation Jason.

44.title: FLICK THAT BEAN

44.plot: Shannon O'Neill flicks that bean all over NYC.

45.title: Ask TCGS #1: Todd from Pittsburgh - Taking Lumps and Losing Well

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

45.plot: Got questions for TCGS? Fire up those webcams and get to asking! We may not be qualified to answer, but we'll come up with something. You're in the driver's seat, so get to know the cast and crew of The Chris Gethard Show, the most overly-accessible show on TV! In this episode, a very attractive Todd from Pittsburgh asks Gethard advice on dealing with self-perceived failure. Gethard might surprise you with his response; he certainly surprised himself!

46.title: Hot Dog: Problem Solver #1 (Taxes with Messenger Bag)

episode of.title: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (TV Series 2011– )

46.plot: Hot Dog here with the first of a continuing series of helpful videos, where I help members of The Chris Gethard Show solve the everyday problems life throws at them. Some of the problems may be small, some may be bigger, but no matter what the problems are, I'll solve them all.

akas: The Chris Gethard Show: Public Access Web Videos (United States)
plot: Web videos produced by the cast and crew of The Chris Gethard Show from its inception on public access in 2011 until it's move to cable in 2014.
